Name: militia
Unit Description: You get what you pay for.

Name: bowman
Unit Description: Basic archer with a ranged attack.

Name: ghoul
Unit Description: Fearless melee attacker.

Name: warrior
Unit Description: Muscular green-skinned fighter.

Name: whelp
Unit Description: Flying dragon filled with youthful energy.

Name: hermit
Unit Description: Dweller of nature - deals good magic damage.
Ability Description: 3HP per second bonus regeneration to nearby allies.;

Name: dino
Unit Description: Slow moving unit with good piercing damage.

Name: commander
Unit Description: Mounted rider that slightly boosts the attack of allied units.

Name: furbolg
Unit Description: Wild beast - inflicts good damage.

Name: wyvern
Unit Description: Flying unit that throws heavy bolts.

Name: chariot
Unit Description: Long ranged catapult. Outranges almost all other units.

Name: blood orc
Unit Description: Strong fighter, moves unusually fast.

Name: frost wolf
Unit Description: Ferocious melee unit with normal damage.

Name: ice troll
Unit Description: Native of Northrend with a slowing ranged attack.
Ability Description: Adds a cold effect to this unit's attacks that slows enemy units' movement speed for 4 seconds.;

Name: warlock
Unit Description: A magician with the fortitude of a warrior.

Name: pandaren
Unit Description: Clawed white-furred savage.

Name: ballista
Unit Description: Long ranged siege unit. Dangerous if protected.

Name: shaman
Unit Description: Orc spellweaver with great magic damage.
Ability Description: Increases attack speed and movement speed of an ally.;

Name: pudge
Unit Description: Brtual abomination of flesh and bone.
Ability Description: Grants nearby melee allies a life-stealing attack.;

Name: gargoyle
Unit Description: Ominous flyer often seen among the dead.

Name: behemoth
Unit Description: Extremely tough attacker. Can endure quite a lot of damage and still fight.
Ability Description: Givues +3 bonus armor to nearby allies.;Immune to spells.

Name: kraken
Unit Description: A widely feared monster with no real weaknesses.
Ability Description: Slows and deals damage per second to an enemy.;10HP per second bonus regeneration to nearby allies.;Immune to spells.

Name: infernal
Unit Description: Fighter from the Burning Legion with immolation flame that can burn nearby enemies.
Ability Description: 25% chance to deal 120 damage and stun target.;Burn nearby enemy land units for 10 damage per second (400 range).

Name: demon
Unit Description: Commander of the Burning Legion. Has a powerful ranged attack.
Ability Description: Increases nearby allies movement speed by 15%.;Increases nearby allies damage by 10%.;Immune to spells.
